name: HSPC_EPSD_BEN_PRDS
description: This table extracts data about hospice benefit periods.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_START_DATE
columns.description: This item tracks the start date of each hospice benefit period for the hospice admission associated with the episode.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_END_DATE
columns.description: This item tracks the end date of each hospice benefit period for the hospice admission associated with the episode.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_COMMENTS
columns.description: This item tracks free text comments about a hospice benefit period.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_CTI_ID
columns.description: This item tracks the ID of the Certificate of Terminal Illness verbal order that corresponds to this hospice benefit period.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_NUM
columns.description: This item tracks the hospice benefit period number for the hospice admission associated with the episode.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_F2F_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Face to Face verbal order record that corresponds to this hospice benefit period.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_VCTI_DT
columns.description: The date of the verbal CTI that corresponds to this benefit period.

columns.name: BNFT_PD_VCTI_SER_ID
columns.description: The provider who gave the verbal CTI that corresponds to this benefit period.

columns.name: BT_PD_VCTI_RCVR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who received the verbal certificate of illness (CTI) from the provider.

columns.name: BT_PD_VCTI_RCVR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_2ND_VCTI_DT
columns.description: The date of the second verbal certificate of terminal illness (CTI).

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_2ND_VCTI_SER_ID
columns.description: The provider who gave the second verbal certificate of terminal illness (CTI).

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_2ND_VCTI_RCVR_ID
columns.description: The person who received the second verbal certificate of illness (CTI) from the provider.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_2ND_VCTI_RCVR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_VCTI_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the note record associated with the first verbal CTI for this hospice benefit period.

columns.name: BNFT_PRD_2ND_VCTI_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note associated with the second verbal Certificate of Terminal Illness.
